Build ID: 4.4.0.3

Steps To Reproduce:
In order to use the IAC it must be configured prior to initial  
use.  The "lib" directory and its contained file "config.jar" is missing in the following locations:
TPTP 4.4.0.3
eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.tptp.platform.ac.win_ia32_4.4.1.v200709261752\agent_controller

TPTP 4.4.1
eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.tptp.platform.ac.win_ia32_4.4.0.v200706020100\agent_controller

More information:
This problem exists in both version 4.4.0.3 and 4.4.1.
The problem exists in both sdk and runtime distributions.

Also note that the version of the agent controller in 4.4.1 is older than the version distributed with the previous release 4.4.0.3.

Note: Temporary workaround - Download and install the standalone agent controller, configure it and start prior to each eclipse instance where you wish to use TPTP features that depend on the AgentController.
